item.title: Counting Happy Numbers in Mathematica
item.description: Here is a Mathematica snippit to count the number of Happy Numbers up to 1000: Length[Select[Range[1000],FixedPoint[Total[IntegerDigits[#]^2]&,#,10]==1&]]
